page.title: 07The Mackie Academy
page.content:
The new Mackie moved to its present site in 1969.It was designed to accommodate 1000 pupils but the 1984/85 roll is 1754.The school is overcrowded and there are 27 hutted classrooms. Over 1000 pupils travel to Mackie by bus but the new Portlethen Academy should reduce this number by several hundred.
The Rector of Mackie,Mr J.Fraser, was interviewed:_ { What is your normal day? No set routine_starts at 0815 by opening mail and dealing with matters arising.{ {Any problems with such a large school? Pressure on accommodation is a problem as is pupil movement between classes in busy corridors. cont.PAGE 8.
